headline: AI Is Causing a Memory Shortage. Why Producers Aren’t Rushing to Make a Lot More.
summary: The world needs a lot more memory chips and hard drives.  The boom-and-bust memory business has been enjoying its biggest boom in years—perhaps ever.  The rapid build-out of infrastructure for artificial intelligence is consuming a large portion of available supply of NAND flash memory, DRAM memory and hard drives.
